snippet.textDisplay: In the past, many people criticized China's ban on mobile apps and social media platforms such as Facebook, Google, WhatsApp, and YouTube, calling it a restriction on freedom of speech. However, since the outbreak of the war between Russia and Ukraine, we have seen how Western internet social media platforms treat official Russian media accounts. YouTube has directly shut down these accounts, making it impossible for us to receive news from Russia. The public's judgment on the Russia-Ukraine situation can only be obtained indirectly from Western media, leading to potential misjudgments. The so-called freedom of the press advocated by the West becomes a joke in such circumstances. Indians continue to enjoy these Western internet products without hesitation. Only when India encounters conflicts with the West similar to Russia's situation will you realize who actually holds the leverage. You are aware of the threat posed by TikTok but fail to recognize the threat from Western internet platforms.
snippet.textOriginal: In the past, many people criticized China's ban on mobile apps and social media platforms such as Facebook, Google, WhatsApp, and YouTube, calling it a restriction on freedom of speech. snippet.textDisplay: Chinese people don't have any special high regards for India, because we have a traditional custom of treating our guests well, no matter where you are from, as long as you abide by the law, we will treat you well. And if Chinese government is really having issue with your country, just think about it, It's very easy to make the people issue with India too, just a little exaggerated propaganda can be do it. One thing you need to know is that the people are always hawks, and the government is the one who ultimately chooses to compromise, any country is the same.

snippet.textDisplay:
Welcome n happy to see in a country that is talked about n people are anxiously waiting to visit. We feel that Chinese on first impressions are reserved but when we interact. They are really friendly. I happened to meet a Chinese couple in Oludenis-Turkey on a boat ride n become open n friendly. They were on a holiday n working in Istanbul. In the end I had over my bus pass of Istanbul to them which was of no use to me as a matter of custom. They were hassitant to accept but later they took it. It was a new experience for me.
I wish you good luck n hope that we get to see actual n new things from your videos.... Happy travelling n TC...🌹☺️
